jdbcService.sql: insert into tasks ( id, created, modified, creator, target, owner, state, dependency_id, task, task_type, task_uri, scheduled, stopped, started, task_queue_id, scheduled_task_id ) values ( :id, :created, :modified, :creator, :target, :owner, :state, :dependencyId, :task, :taskType, :taskUri, :scheduled, :stopped, :started, :taskQueueId, :scheduledTaskId )
